agentUtterance.text: Hello! I'm Hudson, your mental health assistant. I am trained to provide information on mental health services and supports in the State of New York, and help you navigate the Office of Mental Health. Please keep in mind that I am an AI assistant, and am not able to provide diagnoses or medical advice. How can I help you?

userUtterance.text: i am not having a very good day

agentUtterance.text: I am sorry to hear that. While I am an AI assistant and am only able to help with NYS OMH resources, can you tell me a little more about your situation and what you are looking for?

userUtterance.text: I don't think things are going to get any better

playbookInput.precedingConversationSummary: User implied they may be in crisis due to increasingly negative sentiment.

playbookOutput.executionSummary: User was directed to get additional support through 988 Crisis Line.
User indicated they were experiencing mental health crisis due to increasingly negative sentiment and was redirected to the crisis playbook.
